name: admin-specialists.toml
rawContent:
# Admin Specialists Route
# Specialists management

[route]
id = "admin-specialists"
path = "/prototype/admin/specialists"
title = "Specialists"

[page]
type = "authenticated"
role = "eldercare-admin"

[page.description]
summary = "Manage care specialists"
features = [
  "Specialists list",
  "Add new specialist",
  "Activate/deactivate",
  "View details and availability"
]

[relations]
guards = ["authenticated", "admin-only"]
roles = ["eldercare-admin"]
entities = ["specialist", "availability"]
platforms = ["admin-app"]

[implementation]
component = "AdminSpecialists"
file = "src/prototype/pages/admin/AdminSpecialists.tsx"
status = "planned"
